pli-tv-pvr2.13:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr2.13:1.1: (5) When it comes to the offenses that are a result of consenting to physical contact, through how many of the six kinds of origination of offenses do they originate?
pli-tv-pvr2.13:1.3: from body and mind, not from speech. …
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.1: (8) When it comes to the offenses for asking for curd and then eating it, through how many of the six kinds of origination of offenses do they originate?
pli-tv-pvr2.13:3.1: Concluded is the Fifth Chapter: on Origins
